page.title: 15Ben Taylor,Man of Wimbish
page.content: Benjamin Morris Taylor was born in Wimbish in 1895.He was one of 10 children and lived all his life in the village.He married Lucy May a village girl and they spent many happy years together until her death in 1974. With his brothers Charlie & 0liver he founded a Road Rolling Firm which took him over much of Britain.The only time he left the village except for work was when he served in the 1914-18 War. His only child Maurice was killed in action in the Second World War in 1944.His passion in life was steam engines and he was often to be seen driving around Wimbish in one named after his wife.He helped found the East Anglian Traction Engine Club.He died two days before Christmas 1979.In his will he left nearly Â£15,000 to benefit the Church, School, Hall,& every club & village association.
